page.title: 06SHOPPING HABITS IN S. ANSTON
page.content: In June 1985 we did a shopping survey in South Anston. We sent out 160 questionnaires to the parents of children in our school. We got 63 replies. We found out that the average shopper is Mum and she travels by car about 5 miles to Tesco, a hypermarket in Worksop. She spends 1 hour there per week. She goes during the day rather than the evening. Although it is busy when she goes it does not bother her. Working and car parking do not affect where she shops, but she finds it easier to park in Worksop than Sheffield, Rotherham and Dinnington. She shops in Sheffield for clothes, toys and furniture and in Worksop for food. Sometimes she shops for food in the Spar supermarket in South Anston, where she finds the service friendly, the shop clean but the prices high.
